title: Dr. Jean Twenge - "iGen"
description: Dr. Jean Twenge speaks with Michael about her book "iGen: Why Today's Super-Connected Kids Are Growing Up Less Rebellious, More Tolerant, Less Happy--and Completely Unprepared for Adulthood--and What That Means for the Rest of Us." Original air date 28 August 2017. The book was published on 22 August 2017.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Jean Twenge, Michael Smerconish)
